question: hi, I am 40 years old and 5 weeks pregnant. i am 108kgs (237.6lbs). my family has a history of diabetes and high blood pressure. the reading i have done on getting pregnant so late in life is that i have a high chance of getting gestational diabetes and pressure. i already have one daughter who is 7years old.i do not want to diet (not that i know how to lol) but i want to know how to control my eating habits and manage the weight as much as possible. i have not been exercising and so i am not sure if i am allowed to start now.i need all the help and advise i can get to avoid any of these things during the next 8 months.many thanks!
title: Weight management
